name: Little red riding hood (Grimm) Character/Clothes by YeiyeiArt
description:
Little red riding hood is a well-known character. The Lora works with a force of (0.8 - 0.5) use those numbers to get the best results. The Lora adapts perfectly to various styles and is compatible with various models. It can be used individually to create the female version of Little red riding hood or it can be used to dress your favorite characters in red hood tale clothes. To use the Lora use the following Tags (red hood, cape, corset, dress, red skirt), (fruit basket). have fun!!

Restaurant Series: Ronald McDonald, Wendys

Don’t forget to check out my other Disney Series Loras on my profile. YeiYeiArt.

Or

THE NEW !! Villain Collection: Maleficent, Ursula.

⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️⬇️

ADVICE!! “If you want a commission of something in particular, whether it’s a style or a character on request, contact me via email: jeanc.romero.ib@gmail.com.”
